articles.title: NBA finals Game 1: Miami Heat v Denver Nuggets – live - The Guardian
articles.description: Rolling report: The Nuggets host the Heat in the opening game of the NBA finals from Denver’s Ball Arena. Follow all the action with Hunter Felt
articles.content:
How to watch the NBA finals
Every game of the NBA finals will air in the US on broadcast TV (ABC), live stream (ESPN3) and on NBA League Pass. Additionally, Game 1 will be simulcast on ESPN+.
